snippet.title: Randals Presentation Kickstarter English
snippet.description:
Once upon a time, 8 years ago, a video game called Randal's Monday was released. Its fantastic reception caught us completely by surprise. 

We habe been wanting to develop a sequel of that absurd epic for a long time. 

Finally, we have decided to pick up a Randal's Adventures againg with a prequel. So, this is Randal's Tuesday: drastically new.

#Randalsmonday #Indiegame
